topics.body:
Well damn.

A bit of news(cause that's kind of my thing); you know how in the usa there's a fight to legalize pot?  Apparently the people who say, "legalizing pot will reduce crime" were right.  I never believed those people personally and only supported it cause prison time for that is kind of ridiculous, *BUT* apparently they were right.  Since the legalization denver has reported a 6% drop in crimes and on average they're finding out on average places that have legalized it have experienced a 11% reduction in property crimes. . . Well I'll be damned.  Bugger that means I'm going to owe someone a fiver.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
